name: A Partially Disclosed Theme
description:
For My “Variations on an Undisclosed Theme” collection, I used a grotesque photo that I took several years ago and ran it through a feedback loop where I glitched it and then used the output as the new input for another cycle of glitching, repeating until I had an image with the right geometry and colors to create the aforementioned collection. This image is from the middle of that feedback loop. I have slightly adjusted the colors and levels in order to better coordinate with the Variations.

Please note that this artwork was not sold on the primary market. It was minted exclusively as a gift for My pre-sale collectors who bought out over half of My collection in My first pre-sale. I am grateful to have so many people that have discovered My art and like it enough to purchase it. Thank you.

2860x2860 pixel JPG

Minted August 22nd, 2021. Verify via Twitter account @tormential and/or Instagram account @_tormential_ and/or tormential.tez
